text: Maramdi angam athou oiriba mahak adudi nahakki aphaba oinaba Tengban Mapugi thougal toubasingni. Adubu nahakna aranba tourabadi, kiyu, maramdi leingakpasingna maram leitana makhoina thangsang puba natte. Makhoidi aranba touba misinggi mathakta cheirak pinanaba, Tengban Mapugi thougal touba misingni.
